dialogue.text: When I got back, I went straight to the kitchen and joined everyone for dinner.

dialogue.name: Mom
dialogue.text: Hi, son, how was your day?

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Mike and I are alike now, we both have a tooth missing.

dialogue.name: Mom
dialogue.text: Hahahaha, you're such a joker, son.

dialogue.name: Mom
dialogue.text: By the way, how is Mike doing?

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Same as always. He's energetic and plays all kinds of ball games.

dialogue.name: Dad
dialogue.text: Mike is a good kid, be friends with him.
And then I thought about it.
